title: Started studying Computer Science at the University of East Anglia
description: After discovering my passion for programming, I set my sights on software development for my future and decided to study computer science at the University of East Anglia.

title: Web Developer Internship at Robot Mascot
description: During my 2nd year at UEA, I was interviewed and accepted as a full stack web developer intern at Robot Mascot where I worked together with a team to build an bespoke e-commerce website for a client.

title: UEA App Development Internship
description: In the summer of my 2nd year at UEA, I successfully applied for an internship hosted by the university where I worked in a team with other interns to develop a mobile application for some clients.

title: Freelance Web Developer
description: After the web developer internship, I was hired as a freelance web developer to maintain and add new features/content to the bespoke e-commerce website that was developed and launched during the internship.

title: Associate Tutor
description: In my final year, I was asked to be take on the role of an associate tutor and be a lab assistant for a 2nd year computer science module for that semester. I would provide assistance and teaching to students that requested it in the computer labs for that module.

title: Graduated from University of East Anglia
description: I graduated with a First Class Honours in Computer Science at the University of East Anglia.
